It is convenient to describe the shape of our prepared sensor data in terms of the number of
samples or windows, the number of time steps in a window, and the number of features observed
at each time step.
[samples, timesteps, features]
Listing 21.2: Example of the dimensionality of sensor data.
Our example of 10 minutes of accelerometer data recorded at 8 Hz would be summarized as
a three-dimensional array with the dimensions:
[600, 8, 3]
